overview: Three stories of strange and bizarre crimes. In “The Execution,” a sexy female convict tries to avoid frying in the electric chair. In “The Inquisition,” a bank employee who sells drugs on the side finds herself placed in a deathtrap by a co-worker. Finally, in “Strangled Vixens,” two friends dis a guy at a bar who turns out to be a psycho.
title: Lurid Crime Stories 2
